value.scalar:
This is the document:

Pump Manual
Eclass Number: 36410390
Description: Positive displacement pump (rotating, not specified)
Definition: Subgroup (4th level) for objects that cannot be classified into other specified subgroups of the existing structure, but can be assigned to the group above them on the 3rd level
Eccentric ring pump Planetary pump Roller pump Worm gear trough pump
Examples:Screw vane pump Sine pump Toothed belt pump
Suppliers:1) KSB 2) Pfeiffer 3) GEA
Eclass Number: 36410303
Description: Peristaltic pump
Definition: NA
Examples: Laboratory peristaltic pump
Suppliers:1) KSB 2) Rheinmetall
Eclass Number: 36419090
Description: Pump (Other, unspecified)
Definition: Subgroup (4th level) for objects that cannot be classified into other specified subgroups of the existing structure, but can
be assigned to the group above them on the 3rd level
Examples:Steam jet heater Steam jet vacuum pump stand Pump (jet apparatus) Jet mixer Jet scrubber Venturi scrubber Axial piston pump (parts) Chemical standard pump (parts) Thick matter pump (parts) Metering piston pump (parts)
Suppliers:1) KSB 2) GEA 3) Rheinmetall
Eclass Number: 36410102
Description: Submersible
Definition: pNuAmp
Examples: NA
Suppliers:1) KSB 2) Pfeiffer

Input: 
Which are all the  eclass number
